actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Deacon Jacob Estey National Monument.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Interior to acquire, on behalf of the United States, the site of Jacob Estey Hall, Shaw University, Raleigh, North Carolina, for the purpose of establishing the Deacon Jacob Estey National Monument.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Deacon Jacob Estey National Monument.
